title: Desert storm: the victory
creator_credit: Stacy Jolna and Cable News Network
brief_description: This video from CNN’s ‘Special Reports’ team documents the Persian Gulf War. It examines the failed peacemaking process, military strategy, and combat - the air war, 100-hour ground war and the liberation of Kuwait. The celebration and homecoming of the allied forces are also examined.
